name: Ghost Memories (melpomephy)
description:
Explore a maze in different mirror dimensions as you collect the memories of your past.

Use WASD  or arrow keys to move and space to interact.

Currently the game isn't complete, so the memory system isn't implemented yet. But you can explore the map. Also, this is my first game, so I really appreciate all feedback. Future plans for Ghost Memories (to be implemented after the jam ends) include, but are note limited to:

  • A better description and screenshots;
  • Memories: collect memories as you explore each level, collect all to go to next level;
  • More level, each focused on a life stage or big event;
  • A tutorial;
  • Loading screen, menu, saving system, memories counter, transitions;
  • The actual story.
